metadata.title: CVE-2015-4908 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Unspecified vulnerability in Oracle Java SE 8u60 and JavaFX 2.2.85 allowsremote attackers to affect confidentiality via unknown vectors, a differentvulnerability than CVE-2015-4906 and CVE-2015-4916.

criterions.comment: openjfx: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
